posts.post_content:
I was bound to end up with a few dupes.  Only about 20% into the subset, so I need a bunch.  Prefer trades for EPDG, or maybe SGC 40s I don't have.  Would consider cash offers, however:
Cicotte (serious trim job)
J. Collins (was SGC 10)
Lord (mouse victim? was SGC A)
[S]Maddox (was SGC 20)[/S] - TRADED
Looks like a few people took the words "rice paper" too literally on the Lord card. Lol.  Good luck on the sale.
I have a EPDG Hinchman that I would trade for the Maddux.  The creases in my my card are a little less obvious.  Do you need him?

[quote name="john.clowes" post=1120199]I have a EPDG Hinchman that I would trade for the Maddux.  The creases in my my card are a little less obvious.  Do you need him?[/QUOTE]

The Maddox was sent out in a trade today; three still available.
